feature.label: Search (CadBane)
feature.description:
Search(CadBane) is a tool that is specifically designed for for Android development. It includes the following features :
1) Searches for all the usage of a particular string in strings.xml both in the layout as well as its occurances in the java files.
2) Searches not only the usage of the string, but also the occurance of the view in the java files where the string is used.
3) Searches the occurance of the view (from the layout) in the java files.
